languages.text: {n}Лес вздрагивает от радостных воплей: выжившие выкрикивают ваше имя, прославляют {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} и нестройно клянутся в вечной верности. Кажется, с избавлением от эльдаров с их плеч упала незримая тяжесть.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Лес вздрагивает от радостных воплей: выжившие выкрикивают ваше имя, прославляют Вольного Торговца и нестройно клянутся в вечной верности. Кажется, с избавлением от эльдар с их плеч упала незримая тяжесть.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jubilant cries shake the forest. The survivors shout out your name, praising the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and gabbling promises of eternal loyalty. It seems that with the removal of the Aeldari, an unseen weight has been lifted from their shoulders.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лес вздрагивает от радостных воплей: выжившие выкрикивают ваше имя, прославляют {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} и нестройно клянутся в вечной верности. Кажется, с избавлением от эльдаров с их плеч упала незримая тяжесть.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The forest shudders from cries of joy. The survivors are shouting your name, praising the Rogue Trader and dissonantly swearing eternal loyalty. It seems that with the release from the Eldar, an unseen weight has been lifted from their shoulders.{/n}

{n}The forest shudders from cries of joy. The survivors are shouting your name, praising the Rogue Trader and dissonantly swearing eternal loyalty. It seems that with the release from the Eldar, an unseen weight has been lifted from their shoulders.{/n}

{n}Jubilant cries shake the forest. The survivors shout out your name, praising the Rogue Trader and gabbling promises of eternal loyalty. It seems that with the removal of the Aeldari, an unseen weight has been lifted from their shoulders.{/n}

{n}Jubilant cries shake the forest. The survivors shout out your name, praising the Rogue Trader and gabbling promises of eternal loyalty. It seems that with the removal of the Eldar, an unseen weight has been lifted from their shoulders.{/n}

{n}Jubilant cries shake the forest. The survivors shout out your name, praising the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and gabbling promises of eternal loyalty. It seems that with the removal of the Aeldari, an unseen weight has been lifted from their shoulders.{/n}

languages.text: {n}欢快的喊叫声震动了整座森林。幸存者们高声呼喊着你的名字，赞美着{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，不断地发誓他们将永远效忠于你。看来，随着那些艾达灵族的消失，这些幸存者肩上某种看不见的负担也被卸了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jubilant cries shake the forest. The survivors shout out your name, praising the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and gabbling promises of eternal loyalty. It seems that with the removal of the Aeldari, an unseen weight has been lifted from their shoulders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}欢快的喊叫声震动了整座森林。幸存者们高声呼喊着你的名字，赞美着{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，不断地发誓他们将永远效忠于你。看来，随着那些艾达灵族的消失，这些幸存者肩上某种看不见的负担也被卸了下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}喜びのおたけびが森を震わせる。反乱軍の生き残りはあなたの名を叫び、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}への賞賛と永遠の忠誠を誓う言葉とが、喧噪を形作っている。アエルダリを排除したことで、彼らの肩にのしかかっていた見えない主にが取り払われたようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jubilant cries shake the forest. The survivors shout out your name, praising the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and gabbling promises of eternal loyalty. It seems that with the removal of the Aeldari, an unseen weight has been lifted from their shoulders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}喜びのおたけびが森を震わせる。反乱軍の生き残りはあなたの名を叫び、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}への賞賛と永遠の忠誠を誓う言葉とが、喧噪を形作っている。アエルダリを排除したことで、彼らの肩にのしかかっていた見えない主にが取り払われたようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jubelschreie lassen den Wald erbeben. Die Überlebenden rufen deinen Namen, preisen {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/g} und plappern Versprechen von ewiger Loyalität. Anscheinend wurde mit dem Entfernen der Aeldari eine unsichtbare Last von ihren Schultern genommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jubilant cries shake the forest. The survivors shout out your name, praising the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and gabbling promises of eternal loyalty. It seems that with the removal of the Aeldari, an unseen weight has been lifted from their shoulders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jubelschreie lassen den Wald erbeben. Die Überlebenden rufen deinen Namen, preisen {g|Encyclopedia:}{mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/g} und plappern Versprechen von ewiger Loyalität. Anscheinend wurde mit dem Entfernen der Aeldari eine unsichtbare Last von ihren Schultern genommen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des cris de liesse retentissent dans la forêt. Les survivants scandent votre nom, chantent vos louanges et vous promettent leur loyauté éternelle. L'élimination des Aeldaris semble leur avoir ôté un poids invisible des épaules.{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Jubilant cries shake the forest. The survivors shout out your name, praising the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and gabbling promises of eternal loyalty. It seems that with the removal of the Aeldari, an unseen weight has been lifted from their shoulders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des cris de liesse retentissent dans la forêt. Les survivants scandent votre nom, chantent vos louanges et vous promettent leur loyauté éternelle. L'élimination des Aeldaris semble leur avoir ôté un poids invisible des épaules.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los gritos de júbilo sacuden el bosque. Los supervivientes gritan tu nombre, elogiando a{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} y pronunciando juramentos de lealtad eterna. Parece que al eliminar a los Aeldari les has quitado una pesada carga de encima.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jubilant cries shake the forest. The survivors shout out your name, praising the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and gabbling promises of eternal loyalty. It seems that with the removal of the Aeldari, an unseen weight has been lifted from their shoulders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los gritos de júbilo sacuden el bosque. Los supervivientes gritan tu nombre, elogiando a{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} y pronunciando juramentos de lealtad eterna. Parece que al eliminar a los Aeldari les has quitado una pesada carga de encima.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Orman sevinç çığlıklarıyla inliyor. Hayatta kalanlar adını haykırıyor, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} adına methiyeler diziyor ve sana sonsuza kadar sadakatle bağlı olacaklarına dair sözler veriyorlar. Aeldari saf dışı bırakılınca insanların omzundan büyük bir yük kalkmış gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jubilant cries shake the forest. The survivors shout out your name, praising the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and gabbling promises of eternal loyalty. It seems that with the removal of the Aeldari, an unseen weight has been lifted from their shoulders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Orman sevinç çığlıklarıyla inliyor. Hayatta kalanlar adını haykırıyor, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} adına methiyeler diziyor ve sana sonsuza kadar sadakatle bağlı olacaklarına dair sözler veriyorlar. Aeldari saf dışı bırakılınca insanların omzundan büyük bir yük kalkmış gibi görünüyor.{/n}
